room_title: Escape room "The Orphan" by Breakout CoMo in Columbia (MO)
review: We tried and survived Y2K! It was a great experience and the entire group had a blast! Definitely recommend it for a fun night out!

room_title: Escape room "The Orphan" by Breakout CoMo in Columbia (MO)
review: I had a blast doing this! We went for our staff fun day. We did Y2K! It was a challenge but we all worked well together and survived the end of the world with 28 seconds to spare! The puzzles were amazing and really clever. And our host was awesome!

room_title: Escape room "The Orphan" by Breakout CoMo in Columbia (MO)
review: Went to Breakout CoMo for Mother's day. It was an absolute blast. We did Y2K and beat it with 11 minutes to spare! It was a great team building exercise as well as a fun bonding experience for the whole family. Definitely recommend if you're looking for something different!

room_title: Escape room "The Orphan" by Breakout CoMo in Columbia (MO)
review: Had a great time even though I got lost in Y2K! I would recommend to all types of groups and all ages!

room_title: Escape room "The Orphan" by Breakout CoMo in Columbia (MO)
review: I've been there twice and had a great time! Y2K and Room 13 are super fantastic!!! Will be going again for sure!
